version_description:
- Metal Support: Real-time shadows and other advanced graphics features.
- New Track: Park Hills (Classic)
- New Hydrojet: Switchblade

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- Now using CloudKit for iCloud storage, which allows save-game synchronization between iOS and tvOS (Apple TV).
